Name: HollowModManager V3.1
Description: Hollow Mod Manager is a great alternative to monkey mod manager, it has community made mods like yizzi gorilla shirts, and honeylib but also has some "illegal" mods such as rexon and antireport!

Name: Discord Xp-Grinder
Description: This app is useful for discord servers with a leveling system that has a spam channel or jus ta server you want to text nuke! you can set a list of messages and watch as you send them all randomly super fast!
